params.name: do_convert_rgb
params.description: Whether to convert the image to RGB. This is useful if the input image is of a different format e.g. RGBA.Only has an effect if the input image is in the PIL format.

params.name: size
params.description: Size of the image tile. Should be a dictionary containing height and width keys, both with integer values.The height and width values should be equal.

params.name: resample
params.description: Resampling filter to use if resizing the image. This can be one of the enum PILImageResampling. Onlyhas an effect if do_resize is set to True.

params.name: rescale_factor
params.description: Rescale factor to rescale the image by if do_rescale is set to True.

params.name: image_mean
params.description: Image mean to use for normalization. Only has an effect if do_normalize is set to True.

params.name: image_std
params.description: Image standard deviation to use for normalization. Only has an effect if do_normalize is set toTrue.

params.name: do_pad
params.description: Whether or not to pad the images to the largest height and width in the batch.

params.name: max_image_tiles
params.description: The maximum number of tiles to split the image into.
